extendedInfo.description: A sound knowledge of the structure and function of the human body in all of its intricacies is the foundation of medical education. The Focus ANIMATED ESSENTIAL ATLAS OF ANATOMY AND PHYSIOLOGY is one such tool that provides enormous ways to learn, review and teach the human anatomical systems and their physiology. As a learning tool it is the first of its kind to provide in depth details about the systems covered through 3D animation of OVER 200 MINUTES. The systems are elucidated through very graphic, life-like animations. Such a learning tool has never been attempted before and is ideal for e-learning.In this Animated Atlas the anatomy and physiology is organized according to the biological systems of the human body.The Atlas deals with the biology of ALL essential body systems and helps any student of medicine to cope with their peers.The Focus Animated Essential Atlas of Anatomy and Physiology includes a full chapter on: -Cell â the Building block of Life  -Circulatory system-Digestive & Excretory Systems-Endocrine System-Immune System-Integumentary System-Muscular System-Nervous System-Reproductive System-Respiratory System-Skeletal Systems Important Features-The powerful 3D animations accompanied by narration impacts the viewer instantaneously.- Draw on videos to highlight areas for discussion -Each system is dealt as a chapter which provides all the details required for understanding how that system functions.-The Atlas is user-friendly and allows for easy navigation to any section anytime.-An excellent and MUST REFERENCE material for understanding human anatomy and physiology. -It helps to better understand and communicate in-depth information about the human anatomical systemLearning about human systems, their anatomical positions and functions was never so easy!Focus Medica Clients: Boehringer, Roche, MSD, Norgine, Novartis, Wyeth, Allergan, Schering-Plough, Sanofi-Aventis, GlaxoSmithKline, Pfizer, Bayer, Astra-Zeneca, Sun Pharma, Dr. Reddy's Labs

reviews.comment: Rip off!!!!! How many people out there are having problems with this app after paying for it? The company says I\'m the only one!\tI paid for the full package of this app and the videos will not work, on top of that customer service won\'t give me my money back this is a rip off! !!!!!
reviews.author: felicia turner

reviews.title: Costs Money!!!
reviews.comment: I\'m a tutor for anatomy and this app is good BUT for each section within the app costs money to look at the videos. Even though it says to view videos buy the \"full version\" you don\'t get access to the entire app
reviews.author: Stephanie Durham

reviews.title: Uninstalled
reviews.comment: It says free to installed but if you want to view ANYTHING you must buy it. Put it up for the price and don\'t make people download it to find out...disappointed..
reviews.author: Ashlei Sickles

reviews.comment: It\'s a trail! you get one video free then you have to buy full version. Introduction video was lame! Didn\'t even look like it was worth money. Bad!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Annoying
reviews.comment: I say this because for each chapter u have to pay. Im personally ok with thzt, but issue comes in when I want to see a video in chapter I just paid for....have to wait for each video in the chapter to download. Now, it is awsome when it comes to explinations, very informative and detailed so if u need a better understanding this would be a good suggested app. Just dont expect instant access to everything. There is a buy all now button on the welcome page, but I was leery of trying that from customer reviews since it is actually the same price as each of the chapters and for access to everything.......doesnt seem correct... so if u have the patience it is a good app.
